## CollisionDetector.rayCircle() method

射线与圆形相交检测

**Signature:**

```text
static rayCircle(rayOrigin: Vector2, rayDirection: Vector2, circle: Circle, maxDistance?: number): CollisionInfo & {
        distance?: number;
    };
```
